name: Moonlit Clearing
description: A magical clearing that is always bathed in moonlight, creating a place of lunar magic and nocturnal enchantment. The lunar magic provides opportunities for moon-based magic and nocturnal research, while the perpetual moonlight and nocturnal magic create unique opportunities and dangers.
atmosphere: Silver moonbeams stream through the canopy creating pools of ethereal light. Night-blooming jasmine fills the air with sweet fragrance while owls hoot softly in surrounding trees. Luminescent mushrooms and silver objects gleam with otherworldly radiance. Shadows shift and dance independently of their sources.
